description: A nice easy 1/2 day ski tour from the main parking lot at Kootenay Pass to the top of Cornice Ridge, across to Buzz's Ridge and down a safe, treed south-facing slope to the highway. Track then parallels Highway 3 back to Bridal Lake and the parking lot.
directions: Highway 3 west from Creston or hwys 6 south and 3 east from Salmo to Kootenay Pass.
title: Cornice Ridge ski loop
